Directed by: Anthony Pelissier Actors: John Mills, Sally Ann Howes, Betty Ann Davies Production Company: Two Cities Films Release Date: 28 March 1949 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Quiet and somewhat direction-less, Alfred Polly uses the money he inherits from his father to marry and to set up shop in a small town. His heart is in neither of these enterprises and he eventually resorts to desperate measures to break free. His random wanderings in the countryside lead him to a new opportunity that just might be what he's been looking for all along.
